title: nadha nilai
sahitya:
nAda nilai kanDuruga nAn aruganAtha ninadaruL valiyinAl aladenAl



anupallavi



Odu shariyai kriyai yOga jnAnaparanA nAnmOhana manOhara guhakanA nal



caraNam



Ezhishai laya shrutiliya yAzh kuralezhu ghananaya dEshika dasha vidhamA

gamaka gAnam

vAzhum anboDin pura madhura kavi matagaja (dAsan) gAyakapriyanayA nI priyamura
